knimeNode.name: Differential Function Creator
knimeNode.shortDescription: Allows the user to create a scalar function consisting of first order differential equations.

fullDescription.intro: Allows the user to create a scalar function consisting of first order differential equations. This function can be fitted to data with the "Differential Function Fitting" and "Interactive Differential Function Fitting" nodes.
fullDescription.option: Multiple differential equations with or without initial values can be specified here. Equation 1 is the differential equation for the dependent variable.
One or more independent variables. All symbols that are not checked are used as function parameters.
